sentence: The image is a poster for the film "Hoop Dreams."
sentence_cn: 图片是电影《篮球梦》的海报。

sentence: At the top, it says "An Extraordinary True Story."
sentence_cn: 顶部写着“一个非凡的真实故事”。

sentence: Below, it mentions that the film won the Audience Award at the 1994 Sundance Film Festival.
sentence_cn: 下面提到该片获得了1994年圣丹斯电影节观众奖。

sentence: The poster features several quotes from critics:
sentence_cn: 海报中引用了几位评论家的言论：

sentence: - "Unforgettable: Two very enthusiastic thumbs up" â Siskel & Ebert
sentence_cn: - “令人难忘：两个非常热情的赞许” – 西斯克尔和艾伯特
words: Unforgettable: Two very enthusiastic thumbs up

sentence: One of the best movies of the year!" â Peter Travers, Rolling Stone
sentence_cn: 年度最佳电影之一！”——彼得·特拉弗斯，《滚石》
——伊丽莎白·平卡斯，《洛杉矶周刊》

sentence: - "Amazingly rich... A terrific movie as complex, nuanced and unpredictable as life itself."
sentence_cn: - “内容极其丰富……一部如生活一样复杂、微妙且难以预测的精彩电影。”
words: Amazingly rich... A terrific movie as complex, nuanced and unpredictable as life itself.

sentence: - "One of the best films about American life I have ever seen."
sentence_cn: - “这是我看过的关于美国生活的最好的电影之一。”
words: One of the best films about American life I have ever seen.

sentence_cn: – 罗杰·艾伯特，《西斯克尔与艾伯特》

sentence: Inside the first letter "O" is an image of a person with raised arms, standing in front of a city skyline.
sentence_cn: 第一个字母“O”里面是一个人举起双臂站在城市天际线前的图像。

sentence: The credits at the bottom list the filmmakers and main contributors.
sentence_cn: 底部的名单列出了电影制片人和主要贡献者。
